INGVZKX 

ZNK IGXVKZHGM


O YZALLKJ G YNOXZ UX ZCU OTZU SE URJ IGXVKZHGM ZAIQKJ OZ ATJKX SE

ZNKXK OY TU ZKRROTM HAZ O XURRKJ GHUAZ G MUUJ JKGR GTJ IUARJ TUZ
YRKKV LUX G RUTM ZOSK  GZ RGYZ O YROJ ULL OTZU G ROMNZ JUFK GTJ NGJ
VXKZZE TKGXRE SGJK G MUUJ ULLOTM ZUCGXJY ZNK RGTJ UL TUJ CNKT O
NKGXJ G NKGBE LUUZLGRR OT ZNK VGYYGMK GTJ YGC G MROSSKX UL ROMNZ
IUSK OTZU ZNK XUUS LXUS ATJKX ZNK JUUX

RUXJ YGBK SK ZNOTQY O ZNGZ SAYZ HK ZNK NGXVUUTKKX ZNK OTLKXTGR
NKGJVKJJRKX  HAZ O RGE VKXLKIZRE YZORR GTJ XKYURBKJ TUZ ZU YGE G

INGVZKX 

ZNK IUATZKXVGTK

UHKEKJ ZNK UXJKX GTJ TUZ YUUTKX

CNGZ VKXNGVY COZN UZNKX ZNOTMY SGJK YZAHH YAIN GT KGYEMUOTM
ATLKGXOTM SGT YU INKKXORE ZXAJMOTM ULL COZN ZNK HAXJKT UL ROLK OT G
CUXRJ LARR UL MXGBK VKJRGXY GRR HUCKJ ZU ZNK MXUATJ COZN ZNKOX
VGIQY CNGZ NKRVKJ ZU HXOTM GHUAZ ZNGZ GRSUYZ OSVOUAY MUUJNASUX UL
NOY ZNGZ ZNOTM SAYZ NGBK HKKT NOY VOVK  LUX ROQK NOY TUYK NOY
YNUXZ HRGIQ ROZZRK VOVK CGY UTK UL ZNK XKMARGX LKGZAXKY UL NOY LGIK
EUA CUARJ GRSUYZ GY YUUT NGBK KDVKIZKJ NOS ZU ZAXT UAZ UL NOY HATQ
COZNUAZ NOY TUYK GY COZNUAZ NOY VOVK  NK QKVZ G CNURK XUC UL VOVKY
ZNKXK XKGJE RUGJKJ YZAIQ OT G XGIQ COZNOT KGYE XKGIN UL NOY NGTJ
GTJ CNKTKBKX NK ZAXTKJ OT NK YSUQKJ ZNKS GRR UAZ OT YAIIKYYOUT
ROMNZOTM UTK LXUS ZNK UZNKX ZU ZNK KTJ UL ZNK INGVZKX ZNKT RUGJOTM
ZNKS GMGOT ZU HK OT XKGJOTKYY GTKC  LUX CNKT YZAHH JXKYYKJ OTYZKGJ
UL LOXYZ VAZZOTM NOY RKMY OTZU NOY ZXUCYKXY NK VAZ NOY VOVK OTZU NOY
SUAZN

O YGE ZNOY IUTZOTAGR YSUQOTM SAYZ NGBK HKKT UTK IGAYK GZ RKGYZ UL
NOY VKIAROGX JOYVUYOZOUT LUX KBKXE UTK QTUCY ZNGZ ZNOY KGXZNRE GOX
CNKZNKX GYNUXK UX GLRUGZ OY ZKXXOHRE OTLKIZKJ COZN ZNK TGSKRKYY
SOYKXOKY UL ZNK TASHKXRKYY SUXZGRY CNU NGBK JOKJ KDNGROTM OZ GTJ GY
OT ZOSK UL ZNK INURKXG YUSK VKUVRK MU GHUAZ COZN G IGSVNUXGZKJ
NGTJQKXINOKL ZU ZNKOX SUAZNY YU ROQKCOYK GMGOTYZ GRR SUXZGR
ZXOHARGZOUTY YZAHHY ZUHGIIU YSUQK SOMNZ NGBK UVKXGZKJ GY G YUXZ UL
JOYOTLKIZOTM GMKTZ

ZNK ZNOXJ SGZK CGY LRGYQ G TGZOBK UL ZOYHAXE OT SGXZNGY BOTKEGXJ
G YNUXZ YZUAZ XAJJE EUATM LKRRUC BKXE VAMTGIOUAY IUTIKXTOTM
CNGRKY CNU YUSKNUC YKKSKJ ZU ZNOTQ ZNGZ ZNK MXKGZ RKBOGZNGTY NGJ
VKXYUTGRRE GTJ NKXKJOZGXORE GLLXUTZKJ NOS GTJ ZNKXKLUXK OZ CGY G
YUXZ UL VUOTZ UL NUTUAX COZN NOS ZU JKYZXUE ZNKS CNKTKBKX
KTIUATZKXKJ  YU AZZKXRE RUYZ CGY NK ZU GRR YKTYK UL XKBKXKTIK LUX
ZNK SGTE SGXBKRY UL ZNKOX SGPKYZOI HARQ GTJ SEYZOI CGEY GTJ YU JKGJ
ZU GTEZNOTM ROQK GT GVVXKNKTYOUT UL GTE VUYYOHRK JGTMKX LXUS
KTIUATZKXOTM ZNKS ZNGZ OT NOY VUUX UVOTOUT ZNK CUTJXUAY CNGRK CGY
HAZ G YVKIOKY UL SGMTOLOKJ SUAYK UX GZ RKGYZ CGZKXXGZ XKWAOXOTM
UTRE G ROZZRK IOXIASBKTZOUT GTJ YUSK YSGRR GVVROIGZOUT UL ZOSK GTJ
ZXUAHRK OT UXJKX ZU QORR GTJ HUOR  ZNOY OMTUXGTZ ATIUTYIOUAY
LKGXRKYYTKYY UL NOY SGJK NOS G ROZZRK CGMMOYN OT ZNK SGZZKX UL
CNGRKY NK LURRUCKJ ZNKYK LOYN LUX ZNK LAT UL OZ GTJ G ZNXKK EKGXY
BUEGMK XUATJ IGVK NUXT CGY UTRE G PURRE PUQK ZNGZ RGYZKJ ZNGZ RKTMZN
UL ZOSK  GY G IGXVKTZKXY TGORY GXK JOBOJKJ OTZU CXUAMNZ TGORY GTJ
IAZ TGORY YU SGTQOTJ SGE HK YOSORGXRE JOBOJKJ  ROZZRK LRGYQ CGY UTK
UL ZNK CXUAMNZ UTKY SGJK ZU IROTIN ZOMNZ GTJ RGYZ RUTM  ZNKE IGRRKJ
NOS QOTMVUYZ UT HUGXJ UL ZNK VKWAUJ HKIGAYK OT LUXS NK IUARJ HK
CKRR ROQKTKJ ZU ZNK YNUXZ YWAGXK ZOSHKX QTUCT HE ZNGZ TGSK OT GXIZOI
CNGRKXY GTJ CNOIN HE ZNK SKGTY UL SGTE XGJOGZOTM YOJK ZOSHKXY
OTYKXZKJ OTZU OZ YKXBKY ZU HXGIK ZNK YNOV GMGOTYZ ZNK OIE
IUTIAYYOUTY UL ZNUYK HGZZKXOTM YKGY

TUC ZNKYK ZNXKK SGZKYYZGXHAIQ YZAHH GTJ LRGYQ CKXK SUSKTZUAY
SKT  ZNKE OZ CGY CNU HE ATOBKXYGR VXKYIXOVZOUT IUSSGTJKJ ZNXKK UL ZNK
VKWAUJY HUGZY GY NKGJYSKT  OT ZNGZ MXGTJ UXJKX UL HGZZRK OT CNOIN
IGVZGOT GNGH CUARJ VXUHGHRE SGXYNGR NOY LUXIKY ZU JKYIKTJ UT ZNK
CNGRKY ZNKYK ZNXKK NKGJYSKT CKXK GY IGVZGOTY UL IUSVGTOKY  UX

VOIQKJ ZXOU UL RGTIKXY KBKT GY ZNK NGXVUUTKKXY CKXK LROTMKXY UL
PGBKROTY

GTJ YOTIK OT ZNOY LGSUAY LOYNKXE KGIN SGZK UX NKGJYSGT ROQK G
MUZNOI QTOMNZ UL URJ OY GRCGEY GIIUSVGTOKJ HE NOY HUGZYZKKXKX UX
NGXVUUTKKX CNU OT IKXZGOT IUTPATIZAXKY VXUBOJKY NOS COZN G LXKYN

NKGJYSGT KGIN UL ZNKS HKRUTMKJ

YKRKIZKJ LUX NOY YWAOXK  HAZ WAKKWAKM OY GRXKGJE QTUCT

YKIUTJ SGZKY YWAOXK

ZNOXJ GSUTM ZNK NGXVUUTKKXY CGY JGMMUU G MOMGTZOI IUGRHRGIQ

YNOVY UL UCTKXY ATIUSSUTRE NKKJLAR UL CNGZ SGTTKX UL SKT ZNKE

ZNGZ GZ ZNK VXKYKTZ JGE TUZ UTK OT ZCU UL ZNK SGTE ZNUAYGTJ SKT
HKLUXK ZNK SGYZ KSVRUEKJ OT ZNK GSKXOIGT CNGRK LOYNKXE GXK GSKXOIGTY

INGVZKX 

GNGH


LUX YKBKXGR JGEY GLZKX RKGBOTM TGTZAIQKZ TUZNOTM GHUBK NGZINKY CGY
YKKT UL IGVZGOT GNGH  ZNK SGZKY XKMARGXRE XKROKBKJ KGIN UZNKX GZ ZNK
CGZINKY GTJ LUX GAMNZ ZNGZ IUARJ HK YKKT ZU ZNK IUTZXGXE ZNKE
YKKSKJ ZU HK ZNK UTRE IUSSGTJKXY UL ZNK YNOV UTRE ZNKE YUSKZOSKY
OYYAKJ LXUS ZNK IGHOT COZN UXJKXY YU YAJJKT GTJ VKXKSVZUXE ZNGZ
GLZKX GRR OZ CGY VRGOT ZNKE HAZ IUSSGTJKJ BOIGXOUAYRE  EKY ZNKOX
YAVXKSK RUXJ GTJ JOIZGZUX CGY ZNKXK ZNUAMN NOZNKXZU ATYKKT HE GTE
KEKY TUZ VKXSOZZKJ ZU VKTKZXGZK OTZU ZNK TUC YGIXKJ XKZXKGZ UL ZNK
IGHOT

KBKXE ZOSK O GYIKTJKJ ZU ZNK JKIQ LXUS SE CGZINKY HKRUC O OTYZGTZRE
MGFKJ GLZ ZU SGXQ OL GTE YZXGTMK LGIK CKXK BOYOHRK LUX SE LOXYZ
BGMAK JOYWAOKZAJK ZUAINOTM ZNK ATQTUCT IGVZGOT TUC OT ZNK YKIRAYOUT
UL ZNK YKG HKIGSK GRSUYZ G VKXZAXHGZOUT  ZNOY CGY YZXGTMKRE
NKOMNZKTKJ GZ ZOSKY HE ZNK XGMMKJ KROPGNY JOGHUROIGR OTIUNKXKTIKY
ATOTBOZKJRE XKIAXXOTM ZU SK COZN G YAHZRK KTKXME O IUARJ TUZ NGBK
HKLUXK IUTIKOBKJ UL  HAZ VUUXRE IUARJ O COZNYZGTJ ZNKS SAIN GY OT
UZNKX SUUJY O CGY GRSUYZ XKGJE ZU YSORK GZ ZNK YURKST CNOSYOIGROZOKY
UL ZNGZ UAZRGTJOYN VXUVNKZ UL ZNK CNGXBKY  HAZ CNGZKBKX OZ CGY UL
GVVXKNKTYOBKTKYY UX ATKGYOTKYYZU IGRR OZ YUCNOIN O LKRZ EKZ
CNKTKBKX O IGSK ZU RUUQ GHUAZ SK OT ZNK YNOV OZ YKKSKJ GMGOTYZ GRR
CGXXGTZXE ZU INKXOYN YAIN KSUZOUTY  LUX ZNUAMN ZNK NGXVUUTKKXY COZN
ZNK MXKGZ HUJE UL ZNK IXKC CKXK G LGX SUXK HGXHGXOI NKGZNKTOYN GTJ
SUZRKE YKZ ZNGT GTE UL ZNK ZGSK SKXINGTZYNOV IUSVGTOKY CNOIN SE
VXKBOUAY KDVKXOKTIKY NGJ SGJK SK GIWAGOTZKJ COZN YZORR O GYIXOHKJ
ZNOYGTJ XOMNZRE GYIXOHKJ OZZU ZNK LOKXIK ATOWAKTKYY UL ZNK BKXE
TGZAXK UL ZNGZ CORJ YIGTJOTGBOGT BUIGZOUT OT CNOIN O NGJ YU
GHGTJUTKJRE KSHGXQKJ  HAZ OZ CGY KYVKIOGRRE ZNK GYVKIZ UL ZNK ZNXKK
INOKL ULLOIKXY UL ZNK YNOV ZNK SGZKY CNOIN CGY SUYZ LUXIOHRE
IGRIARGZKJ ZU GRRGE ZNKYK IURUAXRKYY SOYMOBOTMY GTJ OTJAIK IUTLOJKTIK
GTJ INKKXLARTKYY OT KBKXE VXKYKTZSKTZ UL ZNK BUEGMK  ZNXKK HKZZKX
SUXK ROQKRE YKGULLOIKXY GTJ SKT KGIN OT NOY UCT JOLLKXKTZ CGE
IUARJ TUZ XKGJORE HK LUATJ GTJ ZNKE CKXK KBKXE UTK UL ZNKS
GSKXOIGTY G TGTZAIQKZKX G BOTKEGXJKX G IGVK SGT  TUC OZ HKOTM
INXOYZSGY CNKT ZNK YNOV YNUZ LXUS UAZ NKX NGXHUX LUX G YVGIK CK NGJ
HOZOTM VURGX CKGZNKX ZNUAMN GRR ZNK ZOSK XATTOTM GCGE LXUS OZ ZU ZNK
YUAZNCGXJ GTJ HE KBKXE JKMXKK GTJ SOTAZK UL RGZOZAJK CNOIN CK
YGORKJ MXGJAGRRE RKGBOTM ZNGZ SKXIORKYY COTZKX GTJ GRR OZY
OTZURKXGHRK CKGZNKX HKNOTJ AY  OZ CGY UTK UL ZNUYK RKYY RUCKXOTM
HAZ YZORR MXKE GTJ MRUUSE KTUAMN SUXTOTMY UL ZNK ZXGTYOZOUT CNKT
COZN G LGOX COTJ ZNK YNOV CGY XAYNOTM ZNXUAMN ZNK CGZKX COZN G
BOTJOIZOBK YUXZ UL RKGVOTM GTJ SKRGTINURE XGVOJOZE ZNGZ GY O SUATZKJ

WAGXZKXJKIQ

ZNKXK YKKSKJ TU YOMT UL IUSSUT HUJORE ORRTKYY GHUAZ NOS TUX UL ZNK
XKIUBKXE LXUS GTE  NK RUUQKJ ROQK G SGT IAZ GCGE LXUS ZNK YZGQK
CNKT ZNK LOXK NGY UBKXXATTOTMRE CGYZKJ GRR ZNK ROSHY COZNUAZ
IUTYASOTM ZNKS UX ZGQOTM GCGE UTK VGXZOIRK LXUS ZNKOX IUSVGIZKJ GMKJ
XUHAYZTKYY  NOY CNURK NOMN HXUGJ LUXS YKKSKJ SGJK UL YUROJ HXUTFK
GTJ YNGVKJ OT GT ATGRZKXGHRK SUARJ ROQK IKRROTOY IGYZ VKXYKAY
ZNXKGJOTM OZY CGE UAZ LXUS GSUTM NOY MXKE NGOXY GTJ IUTZOTAOTM XOMNZ
JUCT UTK YOJK UL NOY ZGCTE YIUXINKJ LGIK GTJ TKIQ ZORR OZ
JOYGVVKGXKJ OT NOY IRUZNOTM EUA YGC G YRKTJKX XUJROQK SGXQ ROBOJRE
CNOZOYN  OZ XKYKSHRKJ ZNGZ VKXVKTJOIARGX YKGS YUSKZOSKY SGJK OT ZNK
YZXGOMNZ RULZE ZXATQ UL G MXKGZ ZXKK CNKT ZNK AVVKX ROMNZTOTM
ZKGXOTMRE JGXZY JUCT OZ GTJ COZNUAZ CXKTINOTM G YOTMRK ZCOM VKKRY
GTJ MXUUBKY UAZ ZNK HGXQ LXUS ZUV ZU HUZZUS KXK XATTOTM ULL OTZU ZNK
YUOR RKGBOTM ZNK ZXKK YZORR MXKKTRE GROBK HAZ HXGTJKJ  CNKZNKX
ZNGZ SGXQ CGY HUXT COZN NOS UX CNKZNKX OZ CGY ZNK YIGX RKLZ HE YUSK
JKYVKXGZK CUATJ TU UTK IUARJ IKXZGOTRE YGE  HE YUSK ZGIOZ IUTYKTZ
ZNXUAMNUAZ ZNK BUEGMK ROZZRK UX TU GRRAYOUT CGY SGJK ZU OZ
KYVKIOGRRE HE ZNK SGZKY  HAZ UTIK ZGYNZKMUY YKTOUX GT URJ MGENKGJ
OTJOGT GSUTM ZNK IXKC YAVKXYZOZOUAYRE GYYKXZKJ ZNGZ TUZ ZORR NK CGY
LARR LUXZE EKGXY URJ JOJ GNGH HKIUSK ZNGZ CGE HXGTJKJ GTJ ZNKT OZ
IGSK AVUT NOS TUZ OT ZNK LAXE UL GTE SUXZGR LXGE HAZ OT GT
KRKSKTZGR YZXOLK GZ YKG  EKZ ZNOY CORJ NOTZ YKKSKJ OTLKXKTZOGRRE
TKMGZOBKJ HE CNGZ G MXKE SGTDSGT OTYOTAGZKJ GT URJ YKVARINXGR SGT
CNU NGBOTM TKBKX HKLUXK YGORKJ UAZ UL TGTZAIQKZ NGJ TKBKX KXK ZNOY
RGOJ KEK AVUT CORJ GNGH  TKBKXZNKRKYY ZNK URJ YKGZXGJOZOUTY ZNK
OSSKSUXOGR IXKJAROZOKY VUVARGXRE OTBKYZKJ ZNOY URJ SGTDSGT COZN
VXKZKXTGZAXGR VUCKXY UL JOYIKXTSKTZ  YU ZNGZ TU CNOZK YGORUX
YKXOUAYRE IUTZXGJOIZKJ NOS CNKT NK YGOJ ZNGZ OL KBKX IGVZGOT GNGH
YNUARJ HK ZXGTWAORRE RGOJ UAZCNOIN SOMNZ NGXJRE IUSK ZU VGYY YU NK
SAZZKXKJZNKT CNUKBKX YNUARJ JU ZNGZ RGYZ ULLOIK LUX ZNK JKGJ
CUARJ LOTJ G HOXZNSGXQ UT NOS LXUS IXUCT ZU YURK

YU VUCKXLARRE JOJ ZNK CNURK MXOS GYVKIZ UL GNGH GLLKIZ SK GTJ ZNK
ROBOJ HXGTJ CNOIN YZXKGQKJ OZ ZNGZ LUX ZNK LOXYZ LKC SUSKTZY O
NGXJRE TUZKJ ZNGZ TUZ G ROZZRK UL ZNOY UBKXHKGXOTM MXOSTKYY CGY UCOTM
ZU ZNK HGXHGXOI CNOZK RKM AVUT CNOIN NK VGXZRE YZUUJ  OZ NGJ
VXKBOUAYRE IUSK ZU SK ZNGZ ZNOY OBUXE RKM NGJ GZ YKG HKKT LGYNOUTKJ
LXUS ZNK VUROYNKJ HUTK UL ZNK YVKXS CNGRKY PGC  GEK NK CGY
JOYSGYZKJ ULL PGVGT YGOJ ZNK URJ MGENKGJ OTJOGT UTIK HAZ ROQK
NOY JOYSGYZKJ IXGLZ NK YNOVVKJ GTUZNKX SGYZ COZNUAZ IUSOTM NUSK LUX
OZ  NK NGY G WAOBKX UL KS

O CGY YZXAIQ COZN ZNK YOTMARGX VUYZAXK NK SGOTZGOTKJ  AVUT KGIN YOJK
UL ZNK VKWAUJY WAGXZKX JKIQ GTJ VXKZZE IRUYK ZU ZNK SOFFKT YNXUAJY
ZNKXK CGY GT GAMKX NURK HUXKJ GHUAZ NGRL GT OTIN UX YU OTZU ZNK
VRGTQ  NOY HUTK RKM YZKGJOKJ OT ZNGZ NURK UTK GXS KRKBGZKJ GTJ
NURJOTM HE G YNXUAJ IGVZGOT GNGH YZUUJ KXKIZ RUUQOTM YZXGOMNZ UAZ
HKEUTJ ZNK YNOVY KBKXVOZINOTM VXUC  ZNKXK CGY GT OTLOTOZE UL
LOXSKYZ LUXZOZAJK G JKZKXSOTGZK ATYAXXKTJKXGHRK CORLARTKYY OT ZNK

IKZURUME

HKZCKKT GNGH GTJ ZNK CNGRK NGJ NOZNKXZU HKKT VUVARGXRE XKMGXJKJ

GTJ GY LUX ZNUYK CNU VXKBOUAYRE NKGXOTM UL ZNK CNOZK CNGRK HE
INGTIK IGAMNZ YOMNZ UL NOS OT ZNK HKMOTTOTM UL ZNK ZNOTM ZNKE NGJ
KBKXE UTK UL ZNKS GRSUYZ GY HURJRE GTJ LKGXRKYYRE RUCKXKJ LUX NOS
GY LUX GTE UZNKX CNGRK UL ZNGZ YVKIOKY  HAZ GZ RKTMZN YAIN
IGRGSOZOKY JOJ KTYAK OT ZNKYK GYYGARZYTUZ XKYZXOIZKJ ZU YVXGOTKJ

ZU ZNK RGYZ JKMXKK UL LGZGROZE ZNUYK XKVKGZKJ JOYGYZXUAY XKVARYKY
GRR GIIASARGZOTM GTJ VOROTM ZNKOX ZKXXUXY AVUT SUHE JOIQ ZNUYK
ZNOTMY NGJ MUTK LGX ZU YNGQK ZNK LUXZOZAJK UL SGTE HXGBK NATZKXY ZU
CNUS ZNK YZUXE UL ZNK CNOZK CNGRK NGJ KBKTZAGRRE IUSK

TUX JOJ CORJ XASUXY UL GRR YUXZY LGOR ZU KDGMMKXGZK GTJ YZORR ZNK
SUXK NUXXOLE ZNK ZXAK NOYZUXOKY UL ZNKYK JKGJRE KTIUATZKXY  LUX TUZ
UTRE JU LGHARUAY XASUXY TGZAXGRRE MXUC UAZ UL ZNK BKXE HUJE UL GRR
YAXVXOYOTM ZKXXOHRK KBKTZYGY ZNK YSOZZKT ZXKK MOBKY HOXZN ZU OZY
LATMO HAZ OT SGXOZOSK ROLK LGX SUXK ZNGT OT ZNGZ UL ZKXXG LOXSG
CORJ XASUXY GHUATJ CNKXKBKX ZNKXK OY GTE GJKWAGZK XKGROZE LUX ZNKS
ZU IROTM ZU  GTJ GY ZNK YKG YAXVGYYKY ZNK RGTJ OT ZNOY SGZZKX YU
ZNK CNGRK LOYNKXE YAXVGYYKY KBKXE UZNKX YUXZ UL SGXOZOSK ROLK OT ZNK
CUTJKXLARTKYY GTJ LKGXLARTKYY UL ZNK XASUXY CNOIN YUSKZOSKY IOXIARGZK

ZNK INGXZ

TKKJRK UL ZNK ZKRRZGRK ZNGZ YCATM LXUS G HKGS OT ZNK IKOROTM

UL XKVXUGINLARRE GZ NOS COZN GT KZ ZA HXAZK KDVXKYYOUT

OZ OY TUZ VKXNGVY KTZOXKRE HKIGAYK ZNK CNGRK OY YU KDIKYYOBKRE

INGVZKX 

ZNK ZGOR


UZNKX VUKZY NGBK CGXHRKJ ZNK VXGOYKY UL ZNK YULZ KEK UL ZNK GTZKRUVK

INGVZKX 

ZNK LUYYOR CNGRK


LXUS NOY SOMNZE HARQ ZNK CNGRK GLLUXJY G SUYZ IUTMKTOGR ZNKSK CNKXKUT

INGVZKX 

ZNK VGIOLOI

ZNUAYGTJ RKGMAKY UL HRAK
